title: Graduate Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 months. I interviewed at Southern Illinois University in Feb 2007
Interview Descriptions:
Pros
Great pay and benefits.
Cons
Long hours, DM's are hired straight out of college and not promoted from within. This made for some really unprepared Dm's.
Advice to Senior Management
Hire from within and listen to your store managers. Don't treat your store managers like children. A degree does not qualify you to be a DM and hiring them so young is leaving your company open to potential lawsuits.
Interview Questions: What is your biggest weakness?
